infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location is used to show you on the global meditation map, with privacy controls available.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow access to your photo library to select a profile photo.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow access to your camera to take a profile photo.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Synkr to use your location to show you on the global meditation map.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Synkr to access your photos to set your profile photo.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Synkr to access your camera to take profile photos.
